description: The youngest of Ayanami`s subordinates, Kuroyuri often goes on missions with his/her best friend, Haruse. S/he is fanatically devoted to Ayanami and hates the Seven Ghosts, particularly Frau. Kuroyuri is good at using zaiphon in battles and has been seen sitting on piles of corpses or mutilating bodies. S/he seems to make a hobby of getting rid of people who annoy him/her by killing them, as s/he frequently asks for permission to do so.
name: Kuroyuri
